channel.title: "runserver"
channel.description:
Ok so i was trying out a new source and it wanted a different java...
I downloaded the new java 6.0 with EE or whatever it was and tryed everything but it still wouldn't run...
So i went to my source folder with my server stuff in it, went to click "runserver" and it would bring up the cmd screen for a spilt second then disapear...
Can anyone help?

item.title: "runserver"
item.dc:creator: @smokin_acez smokin_acez
item.description:
@smokin_acez wrote:

i got that so i dled the jdk 6u1 (update1) if anyone dident know lol then i just changed the path and class path in enviromental variables jdk1.0.6_01 and it worked for me

Read full topic
